name: By Last Petal's Fall
description:
This is a romance story with six different character routes to follow, each one following one of the potential love interests. Routes are unlocked through decisions made during the game and my aim is to deliver wholesome, touching stories for each heroine you encounter, and show that what we see on the outside is rarely the whole picture.

"This story follows Hiro, a delinquent with failing grades and hardly any friends. He's always had bad luck, but upon discovering that there's more to the world than he thought, his luck turns from bad to worse. He now has until the end of summer to find his fairytale ending, or face the consequences that lie in wait to consume him."

I hope you enjoy experiencing this game as much as I've enjoyed working on it, and that you'll accompany us on this journey as development continues!

For those looking for more ways to support the studio and the development of current and future projects, be sure to check out the Patreon page!
